Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: In relation to the additional vendor fee for a certain track located within Oneida county
Summary: Provides that the additional vendor fee for a vendor track located within Oneida county within fifteen miles of a Native American class III gaming facility shall not be forfeited if the track does not maintain the ninety percent full-time equivalent employee requirement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the additional vendor fee for a certain track located within Oneida county
